property.name: _windowProperties

property.name: text
property.value: Author: Nitesh Mor, Elizabeth Osyk

property.name: text
property.value: Test GDP subscribe via RESTful gateway. This test requires authorization (username:password encoded to base 64). Please place your encoded authorization string in a file named GDPAuthorization.txt in the same directory. The authorization string will look something like: dXQlcm1hbWU6cGFzc3jvcmQ=

property.name: text
property.value: Delete leading/trailng whitespace.

property.name: text
property.value: Append a pseudo-random number and check that subscribing retrieves this number.

note

property.name: description
property.value: Test accessor that spontaneously produces outputs once per time interval. This implementation produces a counting sequence.

property.name: author
property.value: Christopher Brooks and Edward A. Lee. Based on TestSpontaneous by Edward A. Lee

property.name: version
property.value: $$Id: TestSpontaneousOnce.js 1659 2017-05-09 14:26:57Z cxh $$

property.name: output (port)
property.value: The output port

property.name: delay (parameter)
property.value: The delay in milliseconds before the value is outputk.

property.name: value (parameter)
property.value: The value to be output after the delay.

property.name: script
note
property.value: NOTE: To see the script, invoke Open Actor

property.name: script
note
property.value: NOTE: To see the script, invoke Open Actor

property.name: description
property.value: Append data to a log

property.name: author
property.value: Nitesh Mor (mor@eecs.berkeley.edu)

property.name: logname (port)
property.value: The name of the log that we should append to.

property.name: data (port)
property.value: The data to be appended.

property.name: ts (port)
property.value: The commit timestamp of the data, as reported by logserver.

property.name: recno (port)
property.value: The record number assigned.

property.name: gateway (parameter)
property.value: The full gateway address that should be used. An example is 'https://gdp-rest-01.eecs.berkeley.edu'

property.name: auth (parameter)
property.value: The base64 encoded authentication information for the given gateway. For the moment, only basic authentication is supported. For a 'username:password' pair, this will look something like 'dXNlcm5hbWU6cGFzc3dvcmQ='.

property.name: script
note
property.value: NOTE: To see the script, invoke Open Actor

property.name: script
note
property.value: NOTE: To see the script, invoke Open Actor

property.name: description
property.value: Compare the input with a known good input. If you set ''trainingMode'' to true and provide inputs, then the inputs will be recorded in the ''correctValues'' parameters. Otherwise, the inputs will be compared against those in the ''correctValue'' parameter.

property.name: author
property.value: Christopher Brooks based on the Ptolemy NonStrictTest actor by Paul Whitaker, Christopher Hylands, Edward A. Lee

property.name: version
property.value: $$Id: TrainableTest.js 1720 2017-05-18 22:42:06Z cxh $$

property.name: input (port)
property.value: The input value.

property.name: output (port)
property.value: False as long as there is data to compare against the input
